name: Shifter
source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War
description: Shifters are humanoids with a bestial aspect. They can't fully transform, but they can temporarily enhance their animalistic features—a state they call shifting.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light.

traits.name: Shifting
traits.description: As a bonus action, you can assume a more bestial appearance. This transformation lasts for 1 minute. While shifted, you gain temporary hit points equal to your level + your Constitution modifier (minimum of 1). You also gain additional benefits that depend on your shifter subrace. Once you shift, you can’t do so again until you finish a short or long rest.
